name: Indie-MMO Dark Theme
description: A simple dark theme so indie MMO developers don't scorch their eyes out. Applies to website and documentation.

user.name: Michael Cox
user.about: Just your friendly neighbourhood game developer making dark themes for websites that don't seem to like people who stare at screens all day. Don't mind me.

additional_info:
Version 1.1. Written by Michael Cox.

Simple and automatic. Changes all background colours to dark greys and blacks and sets all body text to white.

Works on webpage and all documentation. Code blocks do not have syntax colouring.

Version 1.1:
- Fixed an issue where page titles would be black and not visible in the dark theme.
